Plot the ESEM model

Source: R/lavaanPlot.R
lavaanPlot.Rd

This is a wrapper function for lavaanPlot() from lavaanPlot() package. For more information see https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/lavaanPlot/index.html

lavaanPlot(name = "plot", labels = NULL, ...)

Arguments

name

A string of the name of the plot.

labels

An optional named list of variable labels.

...

Additional parameters as in lavaanPlot()

Value

A DiagrammeR plot of the path diagram for model

Examples

library(lavaan)
#> This is lavaan 0.6-11
#> lavaan is FREE software! Please report any bugs.
model <- 'mpg ~ cyl + disp + hp
          qsec ~ disp + hp + wt'
fit <- sem(model, data = mtcars)
lavaanPlot(model = fit, node_options = list(shape = "box", fontname = "Helvetica"),
          edge_options = list(color = "grey"), coefs = FALSE)
